donor_name: Les Amis Du Liban a Monaco
outputs.output_descr: In South Lebanon, ART GOLD operates within the districts (Kadas) of Bint Jbeil, Tyre, Nabatiyeh, Marjeyoun, Jezzine and Hasbaya with more than 60 projects implemented so far through the partnerships with Principality of Monaco, governments of Italy and Spain, and through  Decentralized Cooperation. ART GOLD South will continue on enhancing the socio-economic status through the Decentralized Cooperation linkages, and supporting income generation and job opportunities creation in supporting the Local Economic Development Agency in the South.
